Name: Obscurity
About the game: Welcome to a dark but warm world! Obscurity is a small 2D game where the objective will be to deliver your little creature! Obscurity will put your logic to the test! Progress in 15 different unique levels with a special atmosphere ... Are you ready to guide your little ball of hair towards the light? Features: ■ Very nice atmosphere! ■ 15 unique levels! ■ Little relaxing game! ■ Very nice 2D decorations!
